special-simplequery:
{{doc-special|SimpleQuery}}
The special page is for simple property-value queries on wikibase entities.
wikibase-specialsimplequery-legend: Describes what the input form is good for.
wikibase-specialsimplequery-label-proper:
Label for the property input field.
{{Identical|Property}}
wikibase-specialsimplequery-label-valuej: Label for the value JSON input field. The field allows the user to specify a property value to search for. The value has to be given in its serialized form.
